abstract: Stars and stellar brands are increasingly becoming a major presence in the philanthropic world, bringing in large revenue and donations for charities from donors willing to pay for access and extraordinary experiences.
snippet: A hug from Jennifer Lopez may be worth a lot of money at a charity auction, with the cause fading to a secondary consideration.
lead_paragraph: A hug from Jennifer Lopez may be worth a lot of money at a charity auction, with the cause fading to a secondary consideration.

headline.main: For Charity, Bidding for Access to Stars — Even a Hug
headline.print_headline: For Charity, Bidding for Access to Stars — Even a Hug
headline.seo: Charity Auctions Turn to What Cannot Be Bought
